duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead cross functional teams in the planning and execution of all Government telecom projects.
Act as the direct liaison between the customer and Lumen Government Services to ensure all contractual obligations are met.
Review, develop, and work with appropriate teams to answer proposal requirements resulting from Government Statement of Work, Task Orders, and Modifications.
Manage and implement complex data services installations for federal government agencies.
Ensure timely and accurate delivery of all contract deliverables and initiate change management reviews and contract modifications.

education_certification.credential: 5-7 years of Federal Telecommunications Program Management and customer liaison experience
Working knowledge of Microsoft Project and associated Microsoft Office suite
Project Management Professional / Project Management Institute (PMP/PMI) certification is desirable
Solid understanding of Data Services installation activities for federal government agencies
Knowledge of the Networx Universal and Enterprise GSA Contract vehicle is desirable
Bachelor's degree in Business or related field (Master's preferred)
